snippet.title: Arc Seed - Official Gameplay Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2023 Showcase
snippet.description: Get ready to pilot giant Mechs and check out gameplay in this trailer for Arc Seed, an upcoming turn-based tactical game featuring roguelike deck builder elements. In Arc Seed, pilot giant Mechs and protect Earth from an interstellar threat. With destructible environments, you will need not only to equip your mech but also to prepare your city defenses. Arc Seed will be available on PC.
